sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import {Button,Tabs,Tab} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Title from '../components/Common/Title/Title' export default function DonationModal(props) { return ( </Modal.Title> </Modal.Header> <Modal.Body> <Tabs defaultActiveKey="profile" id="uncontrolled-tab-example"> <Tab eventKey="home" title="Home"> <p>Tabs</p> </Tab> <Tab eventKey="profile" title="Profile"> <p>Tabs</p> </Tab> </Tabs> </Modal.Body> <Modal.Footer> <Button onClick={props.onHide}>Close</Button> </Modal.Footer> </Modal> ); }
